title: Pregnant Woman

adjectives: Carrying developing offspring within the body.
Carrying developing offspring within the body or being about to produce new life
nouns: The normal location for a pregnancy to occur
Gestation is the carrying of an embryo or fetus inside female viviparous animals.
The condition of being pregnant; the period from conception to birth when a woman carries a developing fetus in her uterus.
The state of being pregnant; the period from conception to birth when a woman carries a developing fetus in her uterus
The state of being pregnant; pregnancy.
Carrying of an embryo or fetus inside a female viviparous animal
Pregnancy is the common name for gestation in humans.
A woman is a female human.
An animal of the sex that produces eggs.
An adult human member of the sex that produces ova and bears young.
An adult female person (as opposed to a man)

description:
A pregnant woman holding her round stomach. Sometimes used in jest to represent feeling too full after overeating, as in a "food baby."

Variants include ðŸ«„ Pregnant Person and ðŸ«ƒ Pregnant Man.

Twelve modified versions of Apple's pregnant woman emoji design are featured in English artist Damien Hirst's design for the cover artwork of hip-hop artist Drake's 2021 album Certified Lover Boy.
apple_vendor_description: The pregnant woman emoji on Apple devices depicts a serene figure, her form gently rounded and subtly shaded with a warm, inviting glow that emphasizes her maternal presence. Her posture is graceful, conveying a sense of anticipation and life, rendered with Apple's signature soft, rounded edges and realistic lighting. This emoji is commonly used to share news of pregnancy, celebrate new life, or express empathy and support for expectant mothers, embodying a feeling of nurturing and growth.
